channel.title: Talkgeek
channel.description:
Juan (owner of Talkgeek, Previous owner of Fagex-BOOO) needs a break so he decided to recruit a few members to run the site while he's gone. I am one of the chosen ones :P. Me and the other 2 users that have to run Talkgeek for the next few weeks have decided that we need to bring a wider community into the forums. We plan on making the forums much much better but we need new members who bring new idea's to the site.
What do we have at Talkgeek?- At Talkgeek there are many different forums for different people, Whether you like Runescape,Hacking,Sharez or even just like to debate or have a laugh Talkgeek is for you. With the arcade,shop and vpoints currently being reintroduced the forums will once again see the light. At the moment we have a famous forum RPG that has made its way into many other forums.
Talkgeek is a forum where anyone is welcome, So what are you waiting for, Register today.
[glow=red,2,300][url=http://www.Talkgeek.org]www.Talkgeek.org[/url][/glow]
(I have permission)
